content: > join my facebook group for community > coupons and cal challenges > > take me to the group 1 yarn knitting for olive pure silk super fine fingering weight #1 yarn 100% silk 273 yds/250 m per 1 75 oz/50 g ball dusty artichoke 1 skein tools us size f/5 3 75 mm crochet hook stitch marker tape measure yarn needle finished sizes & measurements width x length 15 x 7 5 17 5 x 8 5 20 x 10 22 5 x 11 25 25 x 12 5 stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet stitch double_crochet = double_crochet stitch st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch specialty stitches & techniques blo adjustable loop pattern notes headscarf worked in one piece from the center outward in parts headscarf row ties row to measure for your desired fit width head circumference use a fabric tape measure to wrap around the head starting at the center of the forehead choose a headscarf size that matches this measurement or up to 4 smaller depending on your preferred fit and style 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
